titles.title: Break Forth O Beauteous Heavenly Light

authors.author: Johann Rist Johann Schop John Troutbeck Joseph Bar

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
But hear the angel's warning.
This Child, now weak in infancy,
Our confidence and joy shall be,
The power of Satan breaking;
Our peace eternal making.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
A broken race restoring.
Although the King of kings is He,
He comes in deep humility;
His people to deliver,
And reign in us forever.
